DESCRIPTION: Original simulation of Steffen for SPH with resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS.
Original simulation of Steffen for VPH with resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS.
SPH simulation with original ICs (set 0) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS, but with our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001.
VPH simulation with original ICs (set 0) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS, but with our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001.
SPH simulation with our own ICs (set 1) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS and our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001.
VPH simulation with our own ICs (set 1) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS and our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001.
SPH simulation with our own ICs (set 1) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS and our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001 and corrected DesNumNgb = 64 and MaxNumNgbDeviation = 5.
VPH simulation with our own ICs (set 1) and resolution of 64^3 for DM+GAS and our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001 and corrected DesNumNgb = 64 and MaxNumNgbDeviation = 5.
SPH simulation with our own ICs (set 1) and resolution of 128^3 for DM+GAS and our own parameters. Improved MaxSizeTimestep = 0.001.
